scripts.generateReport: sudo npx marge mochaReports/*.json -f report -o mochaReports
scripts.fullRegression: npm run deleteOldReports; npx cypress run; npm run mergeReports; npm run generateReport
scripts.smallRegression: npm run deleteOldReports; npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/integration/Column6/*'; npm run mergeReports; npm run generateReport
